sense.def:
A triumph
je velik uspeh ali dosežek.

seg.quote: The election result was a personal triumph for the party leader.
This machine is a triumph of advanced technology.

sense.def:
Triumph
je občutek velikega zadoščenja, ko zmagamo ali nekaj dosežemo.

seg.quote: I saw a gleam of triumph in his eye.

sense.def:
To triumph
pomeni, da nekdo zmaga ali premagati veliko oviro.

seg.quote: She learned to triumph over her disabilities.
